Workshop on Gender Bias in Natural Language Processing

The 6th Workshop on Gender Bias in Natural Language Processing at ACL 2025.

    • Overview

    The 6th Workshop on Gender Bias in Natural Language Processing is taking place on August 1st 2025, as part of ACL 2025 in Vienna.



    Organizers

    • Christine Basta, Alexandria University

    • Marta R. Costa-jussà, FAIR, Meta

    • Agnieszka Faleńska, University of Stuttgart

    • Debora Nozza, Bocconi University

    • Karolina Stańczak, ETH AI Center



    Contact

    If you have any questions, please get in touch at mailto:gebnlpworkshop@gmail.com
